steps.name: I open the application
I see converter from "Foot" to "Centimeter"
I tap "5" in the number pad
I should see "5" and "ft" in the source
I should see the result "152.4" and "cm" in the target
I open the application
I see converter from "Foot" to "Centimeter"
I tap "9" in the number pad
I should see "9" and "ft" in the source
I should see the result "274.32" and "cm" in the target
I open the application
I see converter from "Foot" to "Centimeter"
I tap "5" in the number pad
I tap in "switch" button
I see converter from "Centimeter" to "Foot"
I should see "5" and "cm" in the source
I should see the result "0.164" and "ft" in the target
I open the application
I see converter from "Foot" to "Centimeter"
I tap "5" in the number pad
I tap in "Show All" button
I should see the title with "Foot (ft)" and "5"
I should see all conversion units
I open the application
I see converter from "Foot" to "Centimeter"
I tap "5" in the number pad
I tap "6" in the number pad
I tap in "C" button
I should see "1" and "ft" in the source
I should see the result "30.48" and "cm" in the target
I open the application
I see converter from "Foot" to "Centimeter"
I select "Millimeter" in the source dropdown
I should see in the "source" dropdown "Millimeter"
I should see "1" and "mm" in the source
I open the application
I see converter from "Foot" to "Centimeter"
I select "Meter" in the target dropdown
I should see in the "target" dropdown "Meter"
I should see the result "0.3048" and "m" in the target
I open the application

elements.name: Convert number with more than one number

steps.name: I select "Millimeter" in the source dropdown
I select "Meter" in the target dropdown
I tap "4" in the number pad
I tap "5" in the number pad
I tap "0" in the number pad
I tap "0" in the number pad
I should see "4500" and "mm" in the source
I should see the result "4.5" and "m" in the target
I open the application
I select "Millimeter" in the source dropdown
I select "Meter" in the target dropdown
I tap "4" in the number pad
I tap "5" in the number pad
I tap "0" in the number pad
I tap "0" in the number pad
I tap in "delete" button
I should see "450" and "mm" in the source
I should see the result "0.45" and "m" in the target
I open the application
I select "Millimeter" in the source dropdown
I select "Meter" in the target dropdown
I tap "4" in the number pad
I tap "5" in the number pad
I tap "0" in the number pad
I select "Millimeter" in the target dropdown
I should see "450" and "mm" in the source
I should see the result "450" and "mm" in the target

name: Convert length
description: User should be able to convert lengths from one unit to another

steps.name: I open the application
I go to Speed converter

elements.name: Convert from Mile per hour to Kilometer per hour

steps.name: I see converter from "Mile per hour" to "Kilometer per hour"
I tap "5" in the number pad
I should see "5" and "mph" in the source
I should see the result "8.04672" and "km/h" in the target
I open the application
I go to Speed converter

elements.name: Convert from Mile per hour to Kilometer per hour

steps.name: I see converter from "Mile per hour" to "Kilometer per hour"
I tap "9" in the number pad
I should see "9" and "mph" in the source
I should see the result "14.4841" and "km/h" in the target
I open the application
I go to Speed converter
I see converter from "Mile per hour" to "Kilometer per hour"
I tap "5" in the number pad
I tap in "switch" button
I see converter from "Kilometer per hour" to "Mile per hour"
I should see "5" and "km/h" in the source
I should see the result "3.1069" and "mph" in the target
I open the application
I go to Speed converter
I see converter from "Mile per hour" to "Kilometer per hour"
I tap "5" in the number pad
I tap in "Show All" button
I should see the title with "Mile per hour (mph)" and "5"
I should see all conversion units
I open the application
I go to Speed converter
I see converter from "Mile per hour" to "Kilometer per hour"
I tap "5" in the number pad
I tap "6" in the number pad
I tap in "C" button
I should see "1" and "mph" in the source
I should see the result "1.6093" and "km/h" in the target
I open the application
I go to Speed converter
I see converter from "Mile per hour" to "Kilometer per hour"
I select "Kilometer per second" in the source dropdown
I should see in the "source" dropdown "Kilometer per second"
I should see "1" and "km/s" in the source
I should see the result "3 600" and "km/h" in the target
I open the application
I go to Speed converter
I see converter from "Mile per hour" to "Kilometer per hour"
I select "Meter per second" in the target dropdown
I should see in the "target" dropdown "Meter per second"
I should see the result "0.447" and "m/s" in the target
I open the application
I go to Speed converter

elements.name: Convert number with more than one number

steps.name: I select "Meter per hour" in the source dropdown
I select "Mile per minute" in the target dropdown
I tap "4" in the number pad
I tap "5" in the number pad
I tap "0" in the number pad
I tap "0" in the number pad
I should see "4500" and "m/h" in the source
I should see the result "0.0466" and "mpm" in the target
I open the application
I go to Speed converter
I select "Meter per hour" in the source dropdown
I select "Mile per minute" in the target dropdown
I tap "4" in the number pad
I tap "5" in the number pad
I tap "0" in the number pad
I tap "0" in the number pad
I tap in "delete" button
I should see "450" and "m/h" in the source
I should see the result "0.00466" and "mpm" in the target
I open the application
I go to Speed converter
I select "Meter per hour" in the source dropdown
I select "Mile per minute" in the target dropdown
I tap "4" in the number pad
I tap "5" in the number pad
I tap "0" in the number pad
I select "Meter per hour" in the target dropdown
I should see "450" and "m/h" in the source
I should see the result "450" and "m/h" in the target

name: Convert speed
description: User should be able to convert speeds from one unit of speed to another
